title: Salmon Terrine with Cream Cheese
directions: Rinse a 0.5 liter terrine mould with water and cover it with plastic wrap.Cover it with about 150 g smoked salmon.
Soften gelatin in water. Chop the herbs finely. Mix well cream cheese, sour cream and lemon juice.
Puree remaining smoked salmon, reserve a few slices to cover the terrine. Heat the wine and dissolve the gelatin is well expressed.
Stir wine into the cheesemixture and season with salt and pepper. Fold in pureed salmon and herbs, mix and fill the terrine mould.
Top with salmon slices and cover with plastic film.
ingredients: each 1/2 bunch parsley, chives and basil
